entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 4. POP 40%
